description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your nanites can cloud the mind and fool the senses. You can spend a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.vh6n0Ad3lamOJXpV]{Nanite Surge (Ex)} to inflict the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.8rIj0ewW4bL8Uph5]{Confused} condition on one creature adjacent to you or within your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KOxmSWm5D1jHy8VU]{Cloud Array (Ex)} for a number of rounds equal to your Constitution modifier (Will negates). Once you’ve targeted a creature with this knack, you can’t target that creature with this knack again for 24 hours.

target.value: One creature adjacent to you or within your cloud array
